javadoc.text: * Lower symmetric dense matrix. It has the same storage layout as the{@link no.uib.cipr.matrix.DenseMatrix DenseMatrix}, but only refers to * elements below or on the main diagonal. The remaining elements are never * accessed nor changed, and is known only by symmetry.

javadoc.param: nSize of the matrix. Since the matrix must be square, this * equals both the number of rows and columns
AMatrix to copy. It must be a square matrix, and only the lower * triangular part is copied
AMatrix to copy. It must be a square matrix, and only the lower * triangular part is copied
deepIf false, a shallow copy is made. In that case, A * must be a dense matrix
